The BPL 2024-25 continues with Chittagong Kings facing Khulna Tigers at Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium. The Kings are currently second in the standings with three wins out of four games, while the Tigers are fourth with two wins and three losses.

Key Points:

  • Venue: Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium, Chattogram
  • Current Standings: CHK - 6 points, KHT - 4 points
  • Head-to-Head Record: CHK has won 7 out of 16 matches against KHT.
Prediction: Chittagong Kings to win the match.

Scenarios indicate both teams may score decisively, with CHK being the more favorable side based on current form.

item.title: India A to play three four-day games against Lions before England Tests - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
India A to Play Three Four-Day Matches Against England Lions Before Tests

Publication Date: Not provided Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Players eager to prove their worth or regain form ahead of India's tour of England will participate in three four-day matches against England Lions between the IPL conclusion on May 25 and the Tests commencement on June 20.

  • India's lack of multi-day cricket has raised concerns following a disappointing season.
  • India failed to make the World Test Championship final, allowing regular Test players to compete for India A.
  • Rohit Sharma opted out of the Sydney Test due to performance issues.
  • Virat Kohli is under pressure after a low batting average in recent seasons.
  • The BCCI is optimistic about the quality of opposition for India A matches.
  • The exact dates and opponents for the matches will be finalized soon.
“It can be a long way back into the side when you consider yourself to be not good enough to play a specific Test.” - Rohit Sharma

In conclusion, the upcoming matches provide a crucial opportunity for players to showcase their skills and push for selection for the England Tests.

item.title: England Great Kevin Pietersen Makes Public Plea, Wants To Become India's Batting Coach - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Kevin Pietersen Seeks Role as India's Batting Coach

Publication Date: November 13, 2024

Source: NDTV

Former England cricketer Kevin Pietersen has made a public appeal to become the batting coach for India's men's cricket team, which is looking to enhance its coaching staff following recent batting struggles.

  • Pietersen responds to reports about BCCI seeking a batting coach.
  • India has faced challenges in batting performances leading to missed opportunities in crucial series.
  • The current coaching staff lacks a dedicated batting coach, featuring notable former players in other roles.
  • Pietersen's impressive cricketing resume includes being the third-highest run-scorer for England.

“Available!” — Kevin Pietersen (@KP24)

The addition of a batting coach aims to revitalize players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, among others, to enhance their performance and consistency.

item.title: One Man Utd star has already stepped up to Ruben Amorim's major criticism of the dressing room - United In Focus - Manchester United FC News
item.description:
Harry Maguire Answers Ruben Amorim's Call for Leadership

Date: October 2023   Source: United in Focus

Manchester United, currently 15th in the Premier League, has seen a rise in optimism among fans due to manager Ruben Amorim's implementation of a new style of play. Recent comments from Amorim about the need for leadership in the squad have sparked notable improvements, particularly from Harry Maguire, who has responded positively to these challenges.

  • Ruben Amorim seeks more leaders in the Man Utd dressing room.
  • Harry Maguire recently had his contract option extended and has shown improved performances.
  • Maguire is now viewed as a leader again under Amorim's guidance.
  • Amorim emphasizes Maguire's change in self-perception as key to his revival.
  • Despite past adversity, Maguire has regained his place as an integral player.
“You can see now the way he plays is different. He feels like a more important player in the team and as a leader, I feel he’s a leader again.” – Ruben Amorim

This turnaround by Maguire not only enhances his own career but also serves as an example for his teammates, highlighting the potential for growth and resilience within the squad.

item.title: Olympic push for kho kho, India’s ancient tag sport - DAWN.com
item.description:
Olympic Push for Kho Kho: India's Ancient Tag Sport Gains Momentum

Published: January 16, 2025 | Source: AFP

The ancient game of kho kho is experiencing a resurgence in India, with efforts underway to secure its place in the Olympics via the inaugural Kho Kho World Cup.

  • Kho kho has been played for over 2,000 years and was a demonstration sport at the 1936 Olympics but never made it into the official roster.
  • The World Cup in New Delhi features teams from 23 nations, showcasing the sport's growing international appeal.
  • The franchise-based Ultimate Kho Kho League has boosted the sport's visibility, making it the third most-watched non-cricket tournament in India.
  • Organizers and athletes express hope that kho kho will gain Olympic status, especially with India's bid to host the 2036 Games.
“The turning point was when it transitioned from mud to mat. It made it into a global game,” - Sudhanshu Mittal, Kho Kho Federation of India president.

The kho kho sport is on the rise, with expectations for it to gain significant international traction, potentially leading to its Olympic inclusion in the near future.

item.title: Sania Mirza shares special bond with this Dubai billionaire, his net worth is Rs..., Shoaib Malik is... - India.com
item.description:
Sania Mirza shares special bond with this Dubai billionaire, his net worth is Rs..., Shoaib Malik is...

Publication Date: Recently Published Source: India.com

In these collection of pictures, we find out all about the special relationship between Indian tennis legend Sania Mirza and UAE billionaire businessman Adel Sajan.

  • Adel Sajan is the Group Managing Director at Danube Group.
  • His company designed Sania Mirza’s Dubai villa.
  • Adel Sajan has a reported net worth of over Rs 1600 crore ($1.3 billion).
  • Sania Mirza has a net worth of Rs 216 crore.
  • Shoaib Malik's net worth contrasts sharply with Adel's, standing at about Rs 211 crore.
  • Adel Sajan's company sponsors several tennis events.
  • Adel was close to Sania and Shoaib before their divorce in 2024.
Sania stated, "I chose Danube Home to design my villa in Dubai and they have truly done such a great job." - Sania Mirza

This article highlights the connections between sports and business as Sania Mirza maintains a special bond with Adel Sajan, indicating a blend of their professional and personal lives.

item.title: Kevin Pietersen puts his hand up as India's batting coach to help out struggling Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and others - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kevin Pietersen Offers to be India's Batting Coach Amidst Team's Struggles

Date: Jan 16, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Former England captain Kevin Pietersen has expressed his availability as the batting coach for the Indian cricket team following reports of a possible addition to the coaching staff. With India's batting line-up struggling, especially with prominent players like Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, there are speculations regarding the need for a specialized batting coach.

  • Pietersen currently in South Africa for SA20 broadcasting.
  • BCCI considering adding a batting coach to support staff.
  • Pietersen has a stellar record: 8181 runs in Tests, 4440 in ODIs, and impressive T20 statistics.
  • India's recent Test losses raise questions about the batting performance.
“...a few names are being considered, including former domestic cricket heavyweights. However, no final decision has been made.”

Changes within the coaching setup are under consideration amidst significant criticism directed at recent batting performances, emphasizing the potential benefits of a dedicated batting coach.

item.title: Gautam Gambhir Calls Out 'Indiscipline' In Team India, Proposes New Rules To BCCI: Report - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Gautam Gambhir Calls Out 'Indiscipline' In Team India, Proposes New Rules To BCCI: Report

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

As the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) contemplates bringing changes to the way the team functions, the families of players are likely to have their privileges taken away. The board has reportedly proposed limited family time on away tours, especially for long assignments.

  • Gautam Gambhir identified 'indiscipline' as a key issue in the Indian cricket team.
  • The BCCI is discussing rule changes regarding family presence on tours.
  • A senior player suggested that match fees should be performance-based rather than distributed immediately.
  • Only one complete team dinner occurred during the team’s stay in Australia.
  • Gambhir's staff privileges have also been curtailed as part of the new measures.
"Indiscipline is the reason why the BCCI is reverting to pre-COVID rules, allowing two weeks of family presence on tour."

The BCCI's proposed changes reflect a push for greater discipline and accountability within the team, prioritizing performance and commitment over personal distractions.

item.title: India Squad For Champions Trophy: RCB Star Surpasses Virat Kohli With Elite Feat, Makes Selection Ca.. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India Squad For Champions Trophy: RCB Star Surpasses Virat Kohli With Elite Feat, Makes Selection Case

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 Source: NDTV

Devdutt Padikkal is making headlines as he boasts an impressive List A batting average of 82.52, surpassing greats like Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma. His remarkable form in the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy has him making a strong case for ODI selection with consistent and outstanding performance.

  • Padikkal has achieved a List A batting average of 82.52, significantly higher than Kohli's 57.05.
  • He has scored 2,063 runs in 31 List A innings with a strike rate exceeding 91.
  • Currently, he is on a streak of seven consecutive half-centuries in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Despite his form, he is not expected to be selected for the Champions Trophy.
“His ridiculous average puts him above Virat Kohli, Cheteshwar Pujara, and Ruturaj Gaikwad.”

Padikkal, having made his Test and T20I debuts recently, could potentially break into India's ODI team given his current form, though there are no immediate plans for his selection.

item.title: India Squad For Champions Trophy: RCB Star Jumps Ahead Of Virat Kohli, Makes Selection Case - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Devdutt Padikkal Makes Strong Case for ODI Selection Ahead of Virat Kohli

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV Sports

Left-handed batter Devdutt Padikkal is leading the stats in 50-over cricket, surpassing established names like Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, raising speculation about his inclusion in the ODI setup.

  • Padikkal holds an impressive List A batting average of 82.52, significantly higher than Kohli's 57.05.
  • He has scored over 2,000 runs in List A cricket with a strike rate exceeding 91.
  • Padikkal's form includes seven consecutive half-centuries in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Despite his stellar performance, he may not make the Champions Trophy squad.
  • He joined Royal Challengers Bengaluru at the base price for IPL 2025.
“His current form could force him into the conversation for India's ODI setup, yet his absence from the Champions Trophy squad seems likely.”

In conclusion, Devdutt Padikkal's extraordinary statistics and form make a compelling case for ODI selection, but his inclusion in the upcoming Champions Trophy appears doubtful.

item.title: "Father Had Heart Attack Two Days Before I Got Dropped, Didn't Tell Him": India Star Shafali Verma - NDTV Sports
item.description:
"Father Had Heart Attack Two Days Before I Got Dropped, Didn't Tell Him": India Star Shafali Verma

Publication Date: October 9, 2024 | Source: NDTV

Shafali Verma, a promising player in the Indian women's cricket team, shares her emotional journey after being dropped from the squad amid personal family challenges. Despite her current absence from the team, she continues to work hard to enhance her skills with her father's support.

  • Shafali Verma was dropped from the Indian women's cricket squad due to a recent poor performance.
  • She kept her team omission a secret from her father, who suffered a heart attack shortly before the announcement.
  • Since her drop, she has been actively competing in domestic tournaments, amassing impressive scores.
  • Shafali emphasizes the importance of mental toughness and working on her weaknesses for future games.
"It's not easy to get over it. I didn't want to reveal it because my father had a heart attack about two days before I got dropped from the team." - Shafali Verma

Shafali's story reflects resilience in the face of adversity, as she aims to improve and earn back her spot on the national team.

item.title: Liverpool transfer news: Real Madrid admit Trent Alexander-Arnold defeat as Barcelona eye move - The Mirror
item.description:
Liverpool transfer news: Real Madrid admit Trent Alexander-Arnold defeat as Barcelona eye move

Date: 05:00, 16 Jan 2025 | Source: Mirror

Liverpool is leading in the Premier League but faces uncertainty regarding the future of key players Trent Alexander-Arnold, Mohamed Salah, and Virgil van Dijk. Real Madrid has reportedly given up on trying to sign Alexander-Arnold mid-season, while Barcelona prepares a bid for teammate Luis Diaz.

  • Real Madrid admit defeat in signing Trent Alexander-Arnold this January.
  • Liverpool is working to extend contracts for Alexander-Arnold, Salah, and Van Dijk.
  • Barcelona plans to make an offer for Luis Diaz, potentially around €70 million.
  • Former Liverpool striker Emile Heskey labels Salah as 'irreplaceable' amidst contract talks.
“If you lose Mohamed Salah – how much does his replacement cost you? Can you even replace him? Absolutely no one.” – Emile Heskey

Liverpool must act quickly to secure their key players as interest from top clubs intensifies.

item.title: Meet Alekha, daughter of star India cricketer Ravi Shastri from his first wife, she has interest in... - India.com
item.description:
Meet Alekha, daughter of star India cricketer Ravi Shastri from his first wife, she has interest in...

Published on: Not specified Source: India.com

This article showcases images and information about Alekha Shastri, the daughter of former Indian cricketer and coach Ravi Shastri, from his first marriage to Ritu Singh. It highlights her interests and family background.

  • Alekha Shastri was reportedly born in 2010.
  • She is interested in classical dancing, similar to her mother.
  • Alekha is also noted as an accomplished wildlife photographer.
  • Ravi Shastri served as the head coach of Team India from 2017 to 2021.
  • He and Ritu Singh got married in 1990 and divorced in 2012, with Ritu retaining custody of Alekha.
  • Alekha has made public appearances with her father.
“Ravi Shastri is working as a TV commentator these days after his coaching stint.”

The article provides a glimpse into the life of Alekha Shastri, showcasing her interests and her family background, especially her connections to prominent figures in Indian cricket.

item.description:

  • Sunrisers Hyderabad: Travis Head, Abhishek Sharma, Ishan Kishan, Heinrich Klassen, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Abhinav Manohar, Pat Cummins, Rahul Chahar, Harshal Patel, Sandeep Sharma, Mohammad Shami

The anticipation for IPL 2025 continues to grow as fans eagerly wait to see which franchise boasts the most formidable playing XI.

item.title: Inside Virat Kohli And Anushka Sharmas Luxurious 32 Crore Alibaug FarmHouse; Indias Star Batter Bungalow Is No Less Than A Dream Palace - Zee News
item.description:
Inside Virat Kohli And Anushka Sharma's Luxurious 32 Crore Alibaug Farmhouse

Published on: [date not provided] Source: Zee News

Star Indian cricketer Virat Kohli returned to Mumbai after spending time at his holiday home in Alibaug. The former India captain was seen at the Gateway of India jetty.

  • The villa spans 10,000 square feet on an 8-acre plot purchased for around ₹19 crore in 2022.
  • Virat invested ₹10.5–13 crore to construct this luxurious home.
  • Designed by top designer Sussanne Khan, the interiors blend rustic charm and modern elegance.
  • The farmhouse features a temperature-controlled pool, expansive lawns, and premium materials like Italian marble.
  • Virat refers to it as their "home away from home," ideal for relaxation and enjoyment.
“This farmhouse is our retreat where we can disconnect, recharge, and enjoy life's finer things.” - Virat Kohli

This beautiful farmhouse reflects the couple’s luxurious lifestyle and serves as a perfect getaway from their busy schedules.
